Name: Indri Consortium
Description: An organized crime ring operating out of the Free Worlds League.
ReputationStatements: Are you after a pat on the head?
Ok, you are of some use to us.
Not Bad. Could have been better.
You are really getting the hang of it. Stick around.
Glad you stuck around. The others are getting nervous.
Are there any more like you? - we have the work if you have the people.
MissionSuccessStatements: You are really getting the hang of it.
BadFaithFailureStatements: What...! Do this again and you're history.
